item.description:
Qi Gong for Weight loss
at the Inner Space January 29, 1:00-5:00 pm
Cost: $59 (includes DVD)

In this workshop you will learn Qi Gong and Pi Gu (pronounced Bi Gu). Pi Gu technique is a type of Qi Gong that is used to shrink the stomach. The result will prevent hunger and stop food addictions. You will learn to retrain your mind to help you lose weight. Using the proper herbs and food in conjunction with Qi Gong heals chronic weight gain, cancer, diabetes, cardiac disease, and other common disorders.

To register visit www.theinnerspace.net

or call 860 674 1561

Is your New Year's resolution to lose weight by going on a diet? Are you frustrated because you have already tried many approaches that produce immediate results, but don't last? You are not alone. Qigong presents a sustainable and self-directed approach. Instead inhibiting your dietary needs, Qigong practice cultivates knowledge of who you are and how your body works. This knowledge reveals how the body regulates itself so you gain the power to control your health and weight. Through simple daily exercises you can improve the rate of digestion, increase metabolism, and promote weight loss.
item.name: QI Gong for weight loss
